text: [squeals]

I've always wanting to do a
photo shoot in a greenhouse.
Trust me, Devil.

Green is going to make
those red undertones pop.

How did you get such a
great deal on it anyway?

Something about a
chemical spill a while back.
Wait, what?
[screams]
[growls]

Who knew discount
equals dangerous?
[screams]

MOON GIRL: Ooh, this
mutated baddie is hangry.

We just need to feed
this flora monster
some photosynthesis love.
[pages flipping]

(SINGING) Plants all need four
things to help them thrive
If we give it what it needs
I'm sure we'll make it out alive

Let's get some
light from the sun
Plants all need their fill
They need to absorb solar energy
With the help of chlorophyll

Next let's get
water to your roots
Go ahead enjoy the blast

So that yummy H2O gets
broken down by chloroplasts

Yeah, number three
is tough to see
Bend the rules down in the dirt
But you need these nutrients
If this glow up's going to work
Last is carbon dioxide

Part of the air this
plant's been denied
'Cause CO2 and hydrogen
Make the carbs to feed a friend

And the plants in
turn hooked us up with
Leftover oxygen
So we're all able to breathe
Show some plants some love
Give them what they need
'Cause they help you and me
See?

All our pal really
needed was some TLC.

Just in time for
our photoshoot.

Avanza we're losing
light, people.
Let's just reschedule.
